name: Crocodile Tears
description:
The little game is about an adventure in the world of cute anthropomorphic animals!

In the game you are expected:
Gubonya is an unsociable weasel (he is clearly not happy with new acquaintances);
The guide is a cheerful and friendly fox, loves to hug his neighbors;
Lala is a caring flying squirrel, in love with Gubonya;
Rogovlad - leave him alone, he needs to calm down.

The game also has an interaction system with... Wait, are you oka̴̕͢ỳ̶̡?̶͝͞ À̮ṛ̝͝e̸͏͙ ̡͉̲͝yͪ҉̀̀o̔̓̑̀͜͡u̴̧ͪ̅ͤ͠ ̴̛̦̬̻͓ͧ͊̀̈́͠͝ų̧̡̧̳̲͔̘ͤ̿̏̅n̴̶̰̦̰̳̈́̈́͒͗́͠w̷̖̮̗̱ͪ͑ͯͪ́̕͜eͭ̈͑̐҉͏̡͏̳̪̮̻l̨ͮͪ̚̚҉̸͚͖͔͖͡l̶̢͍͈̠̞̄͊̓ͪ͜͟?̷̼̱͈̥̀͒̓̓̕͠͞

Ǐ͏̱n̻̆͜ ̛̰ͮt͒͢ͅh̖̎̕e̵̬ͨ ͂҉͔e̼ͬ͡n̨̰̐d̴̼ͮ,̷͉̎ ̴̤̋i̽͏̭t̵̰̾'̵̻ͯs͉̏̀ ̥̒͞u̴̱ͯp͓̎̀ ̬́͝ţ̖ͩo̙͆͠ ̩͋͟y̲̾͟o̾͏͚u̡͎ͭ ̻͆͘ṯ͒͡ò̠͝ ̢̜̉d͕ͣ͡e̵̻̽ċ͖͡i͆҉̻ď̢̯e͛҉̙ ͍ͭ͟ẃ̺̚h͗͏͚i̛̙̒c̸̺̄h̸̞ͪ ̵̩͊o͖ͤ͜f̺͑͞ ̼̅́u̯̅͞s͇ͭ͢ ̧̠̎ĭ̷̦s̐͏̦ ̝̔͡l̸̥͋y̬̎͢i̛͕ͭn̯ͤ͡g̫ͮ͜ ̢̭͂t̛̫̿o̸͉ͨ ̳̃͞y̥̒͟ơ̝̚ȕ̸̹

The game was made especially for the "Sweet to Sour" game jam together with Anka Zlakovich.

Have a good time, player!

Check the .text files in the zip folder for the list of materials used.
